Earthquakes are devastating and tragic natural disasters, and many are curious about the history of earthquakes or want to educate themselves about these potential tragic events. This website has all the info that a viewer can ask for, ranging from basic earthquake information, to large earthquake history, to the different kind of earthquakes and the science between each kind.
